articles.title: Syracuse basketball forward Alan Griffin saves the day with block against Buffalo - Troy Nunes Is An Absolute Magician
articles.description: Junior forward Alan Griffin had a remarkable rejection at the end of regulation for Syracuse. The Orange won 107-96 in overtime.
articles.content: Things looked dire for the Syracuse Orange mens basketball team when it turned the ball over to Buffalo with less than 10 seconds to play. With the score tied at 87 and the Bulls off the races, junio… [+2317 chars]
